title: ISic003467. I.Sicily inscription 003467
body:
Facsimile Images

1QLUTATIUS❦Q❦F❦QUIR
2LONGINUS❦VIVOSSIBIET
3IUNIAE❦C❦F❦VERAE
4UXORI❦SANCTISSIMAE❦FECIT

l.2 reg., orig. vivos

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Quintus Lutatius Longinus, son of Quintus, of tribe Quirina, set this up whilst living for himself and for his most pure wife Iunia Vera, daughter of Gaius

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7511 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Pirino 2005 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001389
